name: Xplenty SSH tunnel
description: A tiny application to initiate a SSH tunnel in order to allow Xplenty to connect to your database.

XPLENTY_SSH_TUNNEL_CONNECTION_PORT.description: The unique port assigned by Xplenty after creating your Xplenty connection

XPLENTY_SSH_TUNNEL_HOST.description: The host name of Xplenty's server

XPLENTY_SSH_TUNNEL_USER_NAME.description: The user name to be used in order to connect to Xplenty's server

XPLENTY_SSH_TUNNEL_PRIVATE_KEY.description: Your private key to be used in order to connect to Xplenty's server

XPLENTY_SSH_TUNNEL_PUBLIC_KEY.description: Your public key to be used in order to connect to Xplenty's server

XPLENTY_SSH_TUNNEL_DATABASE_HOST.description: The host name of the database to connect to

XPLENTY_SSH_TUNNEL_DATABASE_PORT.description: The port of the database to connect to
